title: RAK11721 WisDuo Breakout Board AT Command Manual > RAK11721 WisDuo Breakout Board AT Command Manual > Overview > RAK11721 Breakout Board Overview
content: The **RAK11721** is built around the Ambiq Apollo3 Blue AMA3B1KK-KBR-B0 SoC MCU and the Semtech LoRa transceiver SX1262. It is designed to streamline LoRaWAN and LoRa point-to-point (P2P) communication while also offering BLE functionality via the Apollo3 Blue chip.
parent_content:
The **RAK11721** is built around the Ambiq Apollo3 Blue AMA3B1KK-KBR-B0 SoC MCU and the Semtech LoRa transceiver SX1262. It is designed to streamline LoRaWAN and LoRa point-to-point (P2P) communication while also offering BLE functionality via the Apollo3 Blue chip.  
To facilitate the integration of LoRa technology into your projects, the RAK11721 features a user-friendly Serial Port communication interface, allowing you to configure parameters for LoRa P2P and LoRaWAN communication using AT commands.

title: RAK11721 WisDuo Breakout Board AT Command Manual > RAK11721 WisDuo Breakout Board AT Command Manual > Overview > RAK11721 Breakout Board Overview
content: To facilitate the integration of LoRa technology into your projects, the RAK11721 features a user-friendly Serial Port communication interface, allowing you to configure parameters for LoRa P2P and LoRaWAN communication using AT commands.
parent_content:
The **RAK11721** is built around the Ambiq Apollo3 Blue AMA3B1KK-KBR-B0 SoC MCU and the Semtech LoRa transceiver SX1262. It is designed to streamline LoRaWAN and LoRa point-to-point (P2P) communication while also offering BLE functionality via the Apollo3 Blue chip.  
To facilitate the integration of LoRa technology into your projects, the RAK11721 features a user-friendly Serial Port communication interface, allowing you to configure parameters for LoRa P2P and LoRaWAN communication using AT commands.

title: RAK11721 WisDuo Breakout Board AT Command Manual > RAK11721 WisDuo Breakout Board AT Command Manual > RUI3 AT Command List > RAK11721 Default Firmware and AT Commands [CODE]
content:
The RAK11721 default firmware is based on [RUI3 (RAKwireless Unified Interface V3)](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/software-apis-and-libraries/rui3/#hardware-compatibility). You can access the AT command via UART0 by default.  
The complete list of commands can be found in [RUI3 AT Commands Documentation](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/software-apis-and-libraries/rui3/at-command-manual/).
parent_content:
The RAK11721 default firmware is based on [RUI3 (RAKwireless Unified Interface V3)](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/software-apis-and-libraries/rui3/#hardware-compatibility). You can access the AT command via UART0 by default.  
The complete list of commands can be found in [RUI3 AT Commands Documentation](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/software-apis-and-libraries/rui3/at-command-manual/).
